name: Necro-Herder
description:
Control a man who was infected by a zombie - but he only transformed half way. This infection has given him the ability to herd zombies, however it has also given him a lust for blood.

Herd the zombies into the survivors to exterminate them.

Remember, there is strength in numbers...

Controls:

WASD to move

SHIFT to run

You win if... you convert all the Survivors into Zombies

You loose if... all the zombies die or the survivors escape.
